# User Story

## Story
As a *[stakeholder type]* <br>
I want *[desired outcome]* <br>
so that *[rationale]*.

* _[Rule 1]_
* _[Rule 2]_
* _[Rule 3]_

**Given**  _[initial state or conditions]_  
**when**  _[event or action]_  
**then**  _[specified outcome]_
